title: Neil Jones reveals word Strictly Come Dancing stars whispered before ex Katya's second fall
text:

Neil Jones has revealed why the Strictly Come Dancing professionals laughed after his ex Katya Jones' unfortunate double-fall.

Katya, who is paired with Mike Bushell for this year's series, tripped and fell onto her back during their Magic Mike-inspired Cha-cha-cha.

While she styled it out by telling sports presenter Mike to continue their routine, Katya then stumbled once again when the pair ran up the stairs towards Claudia Winkleman to receive their scores.

She fell to the floor for the second time in front of estranged husband Neil, who was seen laughing and smirking as Claudia helped her up.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

But he's slammed reports that he was gleeful to see his ex's misfortune, revealing the word he and the other pros said to her as she joined them upstairs.

"So everyone is clear no one was [laughing] at @Mrs_katjones fall on Saturday," he tweeted.

"We were [laughing] at the fact she styled it out and still made @mikebreakfast finished the routine and then we all said fall when she got into Claudia’s area so she did as a joke and that’s why we were [laughing] again."

Neil and Katya split up this summer after six years of marriage - but both insisted they would remain friends.

(Image: Mike Marsland/WireImage)

Their relationship fell under scrutiny last year when Katya was spotted snogging her then dance partner Seann Walsh, but the professionals claimed it hadn't affected their marriage.

Last night's It Takes Two saw Katya recall her first fall as show host Rylan Clark-Neal inducted her to the Strictly Hall of Fame.

"It's not who falls, it's about how they cover it up - can we just see how you styled this out," he told her before running the clip.

(Image: BBC)

"It's the legs and the arms, like, 'carry on! I'm supposed to be here!'" he laughed.

"I've never seen a more graceful fall in my life."

Katya joked: "Some people apparently didn't realise I fell, they thought it was part of the routine. Apart from the fact I was trying to hold onto his tie."

And Mike added with faux-horror: "Imagine if you had caught my tie - we would have both gone down!"

* Strictly Come Dancing returns this Saturday at 6.40pm on BBC1
description: Katya Jones spectacularly fell twice on Saturday's Strictly show - and her estranged husband Neil was slammed for laughing at her misfortune
